00046 //
00048 UINT8 ror_bits( UINT8 data, int num_bits)
00049 {
00050         while( num_bits--)
00051         {
00052                 data= ( data& 0x01)? (data>> 1)|0x80: (data>> 1);
00053         }
00054         return data;
00055 }
00056 
00058 //
00060 UINT8 swap_bits( UINT8 data)
00061 {
00062         UINT8 tmp= 0x00;
00063         UINT8 msk_l, msk_r;
00064         for( msk_l= 0x80, msk_r= 0x01; msk_l; msk_l>>= 1, msk_r<<= 1)
00065         {
00066                 tmp|= (data& msk_l)? msk_r: 0x00;
00067         }
00068         return tmp;
00069 }

00074 void delay(int msec)
00075 {
00076 #if defined (LINUX)
00077         usleep( msec* 1000); 
00078 #elif defined (WIN32)
00079         Sleep( msec);
00080 #else
00081         ???
00082 #endif
00083 }

00086 //
00088 UINT32 get_time()
00089 {
00090         static UINT32 startup= 0;
00091         UINT32 time_ms;
00092 #if defined (LINUX)
00093         struct timeval t1;
00094         struct timezone tz;
00095 
00096         gettimeofday(&t1, &tz);
00097         if( !startup) {
00098                 startup= (UINT32 )t1.tv_sec;
00099         }
00100         time_ms = (t1.tv_sec- startup) * 1000 + t1.tv_usec / 1000;
00101 
00102 #elif defined (WIN32)
00103         struct _timeb timebuffer;
00104 
00105         _ftime( &timebuffer );
00106         if( !startup) {
00107                 startup= (long)timebuffer.time;
00108         }
00109         time_ms = (UINT32 )( timebuffer.time- startup) * 1000 + (UINT32 )timebuffer.millitm;
00110 #else
00111         ???
00112 #endif
00113 
00114         return time_ms;
00115 }

00122 /*
00123         -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00124 
00125         DllMain
00126         Entry point della libreria (inizializzare qui i dati globali)
00127 
00128         -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00129 */
00130 BOOL WINAPI DllMain( HANDLE hModule, DWORD ul_reason_for_call, LPVOID lpReserved )
00131 {
00132     static int m_num_instances= 0;
00133 
00134         switch (ul_reason_for_call) {
00135         case DLL_PROCESS_ATTACH:
00136                 {
00137                                         if( !m_num_instances)
00138                                         {
00139                                                 /* Socket library setup */
00140                                                 WSADATA wsaData;
00141                                                 if ( WSAStartup( MAKEWORD(2,2), &wsaData )!= NO_ERROR )
00142                                                 {
00143                                                         return  FALSE;
00144                                                 }
00145                                         }
00146                                         ++m_num_instances;
00147                 }
00148                 break;
00149         case DLL_PROCESS_DETACH:
00150                                 --m_num_instances;
00151                                 if( !m_num_instances){
00152                                         /* Socket library cleanup */
00153                                         WSACleanup();
00154                                 }
00155                                 break;
00156         case DLL_THREAD_ATTACH:
00157         case DLL_THREAD_DETACH:
00158                 break;
00159         }
00160         return TRUE;
00161 }

00199 BOOL board_open( board_data* p_data, const CPLConfig *p_com_config, const cmd_table* p_cmd_table)
00200 {
00201         memset( p_data, 0, sizeof( board_data));
00202 
00203         // init fields
00204         p_data->m_p_cmd_table= p_cmd_table;
00205         p_data->m_p_last_sent_cmd= malloc( LAST_SEND_CMD_SIZE);
00206         *p_data->m_p_last_sent_cmd= '\0';
00207 
00208         p_data->m_p_asw_buff= malloc( ASW_BUFF_SIZE);
00209         p_data->m_p_tmp_asw_buff= malloc( ASW_BUFF_SIZE);
00210         *p_data->m_p_asw_buff= '\0';
00211         *p_data->m_p_tmp_asw_buff= '\0';
00212 
00213         p_data->m_asw_buff_len= 0;
00214         memset( p_data->m_p_asw_buff, 0, ASW_BUFF_SIZE);
00215 
00216         p_data->m_p_cpl_object= malloc( sizeof( CPL_OBJ));
00217 
00218         CPL_BiosInit( p_data->m_p_cpl_object);
00219         if( !CPL_Open( p_data->m_p_cpl_object, p_com_config))
00220         {
00221                 free( p_data->m_p_cpl_object);
00222                 p_data->m_p_cpl_object= (CPL_OBJ*)0;
00223 
00224                 free( p_data->m_p_last_sent_cmd);
00225                 p_data->m_p_last_sent_cmd= (char*)0;
00226 
00227                 return FALSE;
00228         }
00229         return TRUE;
00230 }
00232 //
00234 BOOL board_close( board_data* p_data)
00235 {
00236         if( p_data->m_p_cpl_object){
00237                 if( !CPL_Close( p_data->m_p_cpl_object)) {
00238                         
00239                         return FALSE;
00240                 }
00241                 free( p_data->m_p_cpl_object);
00242                 p_data->m_p_cpl_object= (CPL_OBJ*)0;
00243         }
00244         if( p_data->m_p_last_sent_cmd) {
00245                 free( p_data->m_p_last_sent_cmd);
00246                 p_data->m_p_last_sent_cmd= (char*)0;
00247         }
00248         if( p_data->m_p_asw_buff){
00249                 free( p_data->m_p_asw_buff);
00250                 p_data->m_p_asw_buff= (char*)0;
00251         }
00252         if( p_data->m_p_tmp_asw_buff){
00253                 free( p_data->m_p_tmp_asw_buff);
00254                 p_data->m_p_tmp_asw_buff= (char*)0;
00255         }
00256 
00257         return TRUE;
00258 }

00269 BOOL send_buffer( board_data* p_data, const UINT8* buff, UINT16 buff_size)
00270 {
00271         p_data->m_last_cmd_err= CMD_ERR_OK;
00272         CPL_Flush( p_data->m_p_cpl_object, BOTH_BUFFER );
00273         if( !CPL_direct_TX( p_data->m_p_cpl_object, buff, buff_size)) {
00274                 p_data->m_last_cmd_err= CMD_ERR_TX;
00275                 return FALSE;
00276         }
00277 /*
00278         if( !buff_size)
00279                 return TRUE;
00280         while( buff_size--)
00281         {
00282                 if( !CPL_direct_TX( p_data->m_p_cpl_object, buff, 1))
00283                         return FALSE;
00284                 buff++;
00285                 Sleep( 50);
00286         }
00287 */      
00288         return TRUE;
00289 }
00290 
00292 // 
00294 BOOL receive_buffer( board_data* p_data, UINT8* buff, UINT16 *buff_size, int timeout_msec)
00295 {
00296         UINT16 bytes_to_read= *buff_size- 1;
00297         UINT32 timeout= 4000;           // First byte timeout (mesc)
00298         UINT32 start_time= get_time();
00299 
00300 
00301         p_data->m_last_cmd_err= CMD_ERR_OK;
00302         *buff_size= 0;
00303         while( (*buff_size< bytes_to_read)&& (( get_time()- start_time)< timeout))
00304         {
00305                 UINT16 bytes_read= bytes_to_read- *buff_size;
00306 
00307                 if( !CPL_direct_RX( p_data->m_p_cpl_object, buff+ *buff_size, &bytes_read))
00308                 {
00309                         p_data->m_last_cmd_err= CMD_ERR_RX;
00310                         return FALSE;
00311                 }
00312                 if( bytes_read)
00313                 {
00314                         *buff_size+= bytes_read;
00315                         timeout= timeout_msec;
00316                         start_time= get_time();
00317                 }
00318                 else
00319                 {
00320                         Sleep( 1);
00321                 }
00322         }
00323         if(!*buff_size) {
00324                 // Answer timeout
00325                 p_data->m_last_cmd_err= CMD_ERR_TOUT;
00326                 return FALSE;
00327         }
00328 
00329         p_data->m_asw_buff_len= *buff_size;
00330         buff[ *buff_size]= '\0';
00331         
00332         return TRUE;
00333 }
00334 
00336 //
00338 const char* get_last_answer( board_data* p_data) 
00339 {
00340         int buff_len= p_data->m_asw_buff_len;
00341         char *src_buff= p_data->m_p_asw_buff;
00342         char *dest_buff= p_data->m_p_tmp_asw_buff;
00343         // strip away null chars from the last read buffer
00344         while( buff_len--)
00345         {
00346                 if( *src_buff)
00347                 {
00348                         *dest_buff++= *src_buff;
00349                 }
00350                 ++src_buff;
00351         }
00352         *dest_buff++= '\0';
00353         return p_data->m_p_tmp_asw_buff;
00354 }

00372 BOOL send_cmd( board_data* p_data, int cmd_index, int ch_index, const void *cmd_value, void *cmd_result, int cmd_result_size, CMD_ERROR_CODE* error_code) {
00373         UINT16 asw_buff_size= ASW_BUFF_SIZE;
00374 
00375         if( ( p_data->m_p_cmd_table[ cmd_index].m_min_ch_index> ch_index)||
00376                 ( p_data->m_p_cmd_table[ cmd_index].m_max_ch_index< ch_index)) {
00377                 return FALSE;
00378         }
00379         switch( p_data->m_p_cmd_table[ cmd_index].m_param_type) { 
00380                 case CMD_PTYPE_NONE:            // The command supports no parameter
00381                         sprintf( p_data->m_p_last_sent_cmd, p_data->m_p_cmd_table[ cmd_index].m_cmd_string, ch_index);
00382                         break;
00383                 case CMD_PTYPE_INT:                     // The command supports one integer parameter
00384                         if( ( p_data->m_p_cmd_table[ cmd_index].m_min_value> (float)*(int*)cmd_value)||
00385                                 ( p_data->m_p_cmd_table[ cmd_index].m_max_value< (float)*(int*)cmd_value)) {
00386                                 p_data->m_last_cmd_err= CMD_ERR_VAL;
00387                                 return FALSE;
00388                         }
00389                         sprintf( p_data->m_p_last_sent_cmd, p_data->m_p_cmd_table[ cmd_index].m_cmd_string, ch_index, *(int*)cmd_value);
00390                         break;
00391                 case CMD_PTYPE_FLOAT:           // The command supports one float parameter
00392                         if( ( p_data->m_p_cmd_table[ cmd_index].m_min_value> *(float*)cmd_value)||
00393                                 ( p_data->m_p_cmd_table[ cmd_index].m_max_value< *(float*)cmd_value)) {
00394                                 p_data->m_last_cmd_err= CMD_ERR_VAL;
00395                                 return FALSE;
00396                         }
00397                         sprintf( p_data->m_p_last_sent_cmd, p_data->m_p_cmd_table[ cmd_index].m_cmd_string, ch_index, *(float*)cmd_value);
00398                         break;
00399                 default:
00400                         return FALSE;
00401         }
00402         //
00403         // Send the command
00404         if( !send_buffer( p_data, (UINT8*)p_data->m_p_last_sent_cmd, (UINT16)strlen( p_data->m_p_last_sent_cmd))){
00405                 if( error_code) {
00406                         *error_code= p_data->m_last_cmd_err;
00407                 }
00408                 return FALSE;
00409         }
00410         //
00411         // Receive the answer 
00412         if( !receive_buffer( p_data, (UINT8*)p_data->m_p_asw_buff, &asw_buff_size, 40)) {
00413                 if( error_code) {
00414                         *error_code= p_data->m_last_cmd_err;
00415                 }
00416                 return FALSE;
00417         }
00418         if( p_data->m_last_cmd_err== CMD_ERR_OK) {
00419                 // Verify the answer
00420                 if( !strnicmp( CMD_ASW_CMD_ERR, p_data->m_p_asw_buff, strlen( CMD_ASW_CMD_ERR))){
00421                         p_data->m_last_cmd_err= CMD_ERR_CMD;
00422                 } else if( !strnicmp( CMD_ASW_CH_ERR, p_data->m_p_asw_buff, strlen( CMD_ASW_CH_ERR))){
00423                         p_data->m_last_cmd_err= CMD_ERR_CH;
00424                 } else if( !strnicmp( CMD_ASW_PAR_ERR, p_data->m_p_asw_buff, strlen( CMD_ASW_PAR_ERR))){
00425                         p_data->m_last_cmd_err= CMD_ERR_PAR;
00426                 } else if( !strnicmp( CMD_ASW_VAL_ERR, p_data->m_p_asw_buff, strlen( CMD_ASW_VAL_ERR))){
00427                         p_data->m_last_cmd_err= CMD_ERR_VAL;
00428                 } else if( !strnicmp( CMD_ASW_OK, p_data->m_p_asw_buff, strlen( CMD_ASW_OK))){
00429                         p_data->m_last_cmd_err= CMD_ERR_OK;
00430                 } else {
00431                         p_data->m_last_cmd_err= CMD_ERR_BADASW;
00432                 }
00433         }
00434         if( p_data->m_last_cmd_err== CMD_ERR_OK) {
00435                 switch( p_data->m_p_cmd_table[ cmd_index].m_result_type){ 
00436                 case CMD_PTYPE_NONE:            // No result expected
00437                         break;
00438                 case CMD_PTYPE_INT:                     // Get the result as integer value
00439                         sscanf( p_data->m_p_asw_buff, CMD_ASW_OK_INT, (int*)cmd_result);
00440                         break;
00441                 case CMD_PTYPE_FLOAT:           // Get the result as floating point value
00442                         sscanf( p_data->m_p_asw_buff, CMD_ASW_OK_FLOAT, (float*)cmd_result);
00443                         break;
00444                 case CMD_PTYPE_STRING:          // Get the result as string value
00445                         {
00446                                 char tmp_buff[ 100];
00447                                 if( strlen( p_data->m_p_asw_buff)> sizeof( tmp_buff))
00448                                 {
00449                                         p_data->m_last_cmd_err= CMD_ERR_BADASW;
00450                                         break;
00451                                 }
00452                                 sscanf( p_data->m_p_asw_buff, CMD_ASW_OK_STRING, tmp_buff);
00453                                 strncpy( cmd_result, tmp_buff, (size_t)cmd_result_size);
00454                                 ((char*)cmd_result)[ cmd_result_size- 1]= '\0';
00455                         }
00456                         break;
00457                 default:
00458                         return FALSE;
00459                 }
00460         }
00461         if( error_code) {
00462                 *error_code= p_data->m_last_cmd_err;
00463         }
00464         return TRUE;
00465 }
